name: Claude Code Advanced Plugins
description: Production-ready Claude Code plugins from the community marketplace with enhanced development workflows, code review, and security features

installPlugins.description: Which plugin set to install: essential (recommended core plugins), all (all 9 plugins), development (SDK/feature dev), review (code review tools), security (security guidance), custom (use customPlugins), none (only add marketplace)

customPlugins.description: Comma-separated list of plugin names for 'custom' option (e.g., 'commit-commands,code-review,feature-dev')

addMarketplace.description: Add the claude-code-plugins marketplace to Claude settings (allows installing additional plugins manually)

replaceDefaultPlugins.description: Replace default plugins from official marketplace with community plugins (not recommended - use both)
